  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DAOFactory
    Pattern DAO - QUORA DAO factory pattern applies point 1 and 2 to the way we access database in our application 1 - factory design pattern uses factories to hide the complexity of creating objects from the end user and separating low level data accessing API or operations from high level business services. 2 - DAO stands for "Data Access Object".
    MySqlAutostrada  
    MySqlCasello  
    MySQLDAOFactory  
    MySqlLogin

    MySqlPedaggio  
    MySqlVeicolo
